Mail. ****** *** **** ************* ***** *** ***** She explained in detail about my dental problem and the solution for the same. 

While most of the dentist charge you excessively, she is the most reasonable one I was recommended in Soutj Bombay.

review: Very friendly, easy process, the doctor and staff made sure my child was relaxed and at ease before starting the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting Dr. Varsha since the past 5+ years for our son. She is very patient friendly and diligent in providing dental healthcare services. Recently we visited her for some infection in the gums. It was extremely reassuring to see all the safety precautions and measures taken specially during covid-19, for all patients and staff. We felt in safe hands. Will recommend Crown Corner for all dental treatments!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The process was extremely smooth despite all the new guidelines for covid.. From gloves for the feet and hands to sanitisers and masks for the patient  the doctor and the staff there... Plus we were the only patient at that time..  Highly recommended to anyone
reply_text: Thankyou Ratni....we are humbled by your testimonial...
